Multiple Locks

Multiple locking is a Serena ChangeMan Version Manager feature designed for groups who maintain parallel development paths or branches. You can set options to allow multiple locks on a single revision by different Users, multiple locks per revision by the same User, or allow a single User to lock multiple revisions of a versioned file. For example, if a User wants to create a branch in development of a file that is locked, Version Manager must be configured to allow multiple locks per revision before the file can be checked out.
